original_title: Plínio Marcos — Nas Quebradas do Mundaréu
overview: The theatrologist, actor, director and overall polemist Plínio Marcos gets his life traced through images of the many spectacles he has put on interviews from various moments in his life, from the most rebellious and marginal, when he lacked resources for his art, to when he was invited to go to Paris and talk about his work
title: Plínio Marcos — Nas Quebradas do Mundaréu
